Overview  Package   Class 
ESAPI4CF v1.1
FRAMES  

org.owasp.esapi
Class ESAPI

railo-context.Component
        org.owasp.esapi.util.Object
            org.owasp.esapi.ESAPI

public class ESAPI

extends Object

ESAPI locator class is provided to make it easy to gain access to the current ESAPI classes in use. Use the set methods to override the reference implementations with instances of any custom ESAPI implementations.

Constructor Summary
init([String resourceDirectory])
 
Method Summary
 AccessController accessController()
          return the current ESAPI AccessController object being used to maintain the access control rules for this application
 Authenticator authenticator()
          return the current ESAPI Authenticator object being used to authenticate users for this application

return the current ESAPI IntrusionDetector being used to monitor for intrusions in this application.

logFactory

public LogFactory logFactory()
Get the current LogFactory being used by ESAPI. If there isn't one yet, it will create one, and then return this same LogFactory from then on.

logger

public Logger logger()
The default Logger.

randomizer

public Randomizer randomizer()
return the current ESAPI Randomizer being used to generate random numbers in this application.

securityConfiguration

public SecurityConfiguration securityConfiguration()
return the current ESAPI SecurityConfiguration being used to manage the security configuration for ESAPI for this application.
